thread.title: Your breasts will GROW if you drink this juice, company sensationally claims
thread.title_full: Your breasts will GROW if you drink this juice, company sensationally claims

title: Your breasts will GROW if you drink this juice, company sensationally claims
text:
BOUNCING: This revolutionary juice could help womens' breasts grow “A can a day and you'll be white, tender and busty” Coconut Palm 
Coconut Palm has promised ladies that their drink has more benefit than the standard breakfast juice. 
As well as being rich in vitamins and minerals, women will see their breasts grow if they continually drink the juice. 
And in a slightly racist undertone, Coconut Palm manufacturers have also promoted that the juice will make girls look "more white". 
The company uses a group of scantily clad women in a viral advert to promote the benefits of the juice. 
The ad promises: "A can a day and you'll be white, tender and busty." 
A source from Coconut Palm said they're bold claims were based on a study in 1997 claiming drinking coconut milk helped to enlarge women's breasts. Celebrities support 'Free The Nipple' Campaign Friday, 27th January 2017 Celebrities Who Bared their Breasts in Support of #FreeTheNipple 1 / 20 
But the company has yet to commission any research of their own on this. 
Unfortunately for ladies who love coconut juice and long for a bigger chest, nutritionists have dismissed Coconut Palm's claims as ridiculous. 
There are many home remedies on the market which claim to help women grow breasts. Celebrity nip slips, sideboobs & underboobs Friday, 3rd February 2017 They may be rich and famous, but these celebrities aren't immune from flashing the flesh in our ultimate celebrity nip slips, sideboobs, underboobs and now gapboobs gallery. 1 / 220 Flynet Charlotte Dawson and Ela Rose have both suffered major nipple slips 
Massaging olive oil or fenugreek powder into breasts and eating fennel seeds have all been promoted as ingredients which will make women's chests grow in size and dimension.
